Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Bali Secrets', 'Scent': 'Lemongrass', 'Material Feature': 'Biodegradable Warning', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 6.89 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BALI-SOAP-LEMO'}
Review Text: This is my first time trying this product.  I like the scent which is gently reminiscent of lemongrass.  The pump is a wonderful feature.  This does clean well.  It also doesn't leave scum in the tub.  That makes me happy.  I certainly don't want to break my neck first thing in the morning.
Review Title: worth trying
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Hippie Honey Scrub Exfoliant Facial Cleanser by Hippie Skin
Hippie Skin
['A gentle, invigorating cleanser that sloughs away dead skin, fights bacteria, and leaves skin soft and vibrant. Formulated with essential oils that support aging skin, this cleanser is a must have for a natural daily routine! SCENT: Lavender and honey, yum! INGREDIENT SUPERSTARS: Raw Honey - antioxidant, antibacterial and antiinflammatory properties support reduced scarring and promote skin regeneration. The natural sugar crystallization and glycolic acid contained in raw honey gently sloughs away dead skin cells, promoting cleaner, healthier skin. Lavender Essential Oil: Promotes skin healing, reduces redness and promotes blood circulation, which provides more oxygen and nutrients to the skin. Carrot Seed Essential Oil: Promotes skin health through antiseptic properties. Tightens pores and skin to combat sagging skin and fine lines. DIRECTIONS: Massage onto face with upward circular motions and rinse well with warm water. Recommended for all skin types.']
{'Brand': 'Hippie Skin', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Dry, Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 2.68 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '865233000117', 'Manufacturer': 'Hippie Skin'}
The scrub has a creamy texture and smell strongly of honey.  It applies easily to the skin, and rinses off without effort.  My skin feels soft after use, and it has helped with my break-outs
It applies easily to the skin
Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free All Natural Hair Repair Treatment, Clarifying Volumizing & Moisturizing, Color Safe, Gentle for Curly & Color Treated Hair Gift Set (2x 8oz)
Premium Nature
{'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Premium Nature', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Damaged,All,Straight,Color Treated', 'Special Ingredients': 'Vitamin-e,Jojoba-oil,Almond-oil,Peach,Argan-oil,Camellia-oil'}
I have been using this shampoo and conditioner set only briefly. Nevertheless, it smells pleasant, it didn't leave my hair tangled, or oily. It left my hair with a lot of body, and very soft. Of course, time will tell as to how my hair hold up in the long run. For the time being however… I am very  pleased.
So far I am very satisfied.
Smooth Lavender Sugar Scrub
Lime and Lotus Organics
{'Brand': 'Lime and Lotus Organics', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Information': 'Jar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 2.75 x 1.75 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038258284'}
I'll admit when I first received this scrub I was disappointed.  It was a small container, and I thought it would be gone within a week.  It has been three weeks, and I barely made a dent!  The scent is lovely, the scrub is luxurious, and most importantly... it works!  My skin is smooth and blemish-free.  That is quite the achievement!
A surprise

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** The user continues to prefer natural skincare and haircare products with gentle formulations aimed at versatile usage. They show an interest in high-quality products, as reflected in their recent purchase of a multifunctional cleansing product.

- **Scent Preferences:** The user enjoys calming scents and has recently added lemongrass to their preferred fragrance palette, appreciating its subtlety and freshness alongside their established preference for lavender.

- **Skin and Hair Types:** They seek products that cater to sensitive skin and address various conditions, particularly focusing on maintaining healthy skin and hair vitality.

- **Texture Preferences:** They favor creamy and luxurious textures, with a consistent interest in products that provide effective detangling and overall ease of use.

- **Usage Focus:** The user looks for functional products that enhance texture and promote overall health, reflecting a desire for transformative results in personal care.

- **Review Tendencies:** They offer insightful feedback, highlighting sensory experiences and practical benefits. Their recent review emphasized satisfaction with the product's cleaning ability and user-friendly features.

- **Natural Ingredients:** The user maintains a strong preference for natural and organic formulations across all personal care categories, reinforcing their commitment to effective, holistic care solutions.

Overall, the user prioritizes high-quality, sensorial experiences while valuing performance, health benefits, and effective cleansing solutions in their skincare and haircare routines.
